posts.post_title: FS: T206 Gandil SGC 50 Sovereign SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Selling this nice T206 Gandil (Black Sox) SGC 50 with Sovereign 460/25 back. Nice centering front and back. Asking SOLD delivered and considering offers. Email questions to [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url] Thanks!
